revised_title: Twin Research: From Francis Galton to Modern Methods
tldr: The author discusses the history of twin research, from its beginnings with Francis Galton to modern methods of diagnosis. They explain how twin studies can help distinguish between the effects of heredity and environment on human development and characteristics. The author also describes the methodology used to diagnose whether twins are monozygotic or dizygotic, and the importance of this research for understanding heredity and genetics.
